cleaned_text: Why is the medicine wheel important to First Nations? Question: Why is the medicine wheel important to First Nations? First Nations and the Medicine Wheel: First Nations is the term used in Canada to describe the indigenous people. This term was first introduced in the 1970's by the Canadian government to replace the term Indians which was perceived to be racist. The term First Nations is more respectful and recognizes the important role the indigenous people played in the formation and development of the country.
